91 Innovation Fellows 🧑‍💻

Dec 10, 2024

  • civictech
  • episode
  • innovation
  • politics
  • government
  • academia

We’re joined by Sarah Schacht, Senior Data Fellow at Data Foundation and author of a new report called Innovation Fellowship Career Outcomes. We’ll dive in and talk about this report, their research, and the innovation fellowship space.
